title: Go Bigger. Go Beyond. | 10-Inch Alpine Restyle  Dash System
description: Just when you thought your dash had it all, the X110-SLV & X110-SRA raise the bar. With their groundbreaking 10-inch touchscreen, the X110-SLV & X110-SRA are truly the largest factory radio replacement for 2014-up GM Trucks (Silverado & Sierra) available, period.

asset.title: Go Bigger. Go Beyond. | 10-Inch Alpine Restyle  Dash System
asset.description:
Just when you thought your dash had it all, the X110-SLV & X110-SRA raise the bar. With their groundbreaking 10-inch touchscreen, the X110-SLV & X110-SRA are truly the largest factory radio replacement for 2014-up GM Trucks (Silverado & Sierra) available, period.  

Have you upgraded your GM Truck with accessories like a winch, lights, air suspension and a motorized tonneau cover? No need to add switches that clutter your dash anymore. Now you can conveniently control these accessories directly from the 10-Inch touchscreen! The KAC-001 Truck Accessory Controller (sold separately) turns the 10-Inch into a hub to connect and control these accessories. Eight individual outputs are available to control eight relay-connected accessories, and the accessories can be configured as Pulsed, Latched or Momentary Outputs. Graphical icons can be assigned to each accessory for quick identification on the screen. 

More information: http://bit.ly/x110-sra
asset.author: AlpineTV
